snippet.title: FLAKE The Legend of Snowblind - official trailer - coldest point and click adventure ever
snippet.description:
FLAKE The Legend of Snowblind
New point and click adventure 

Buy NOW on STEAM:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2754120/FLAKE_The_Legend_of_Snowblind/

Buy on GOG:
https://www.gog.com/en/game/flake_the_legend_of_snowblind


https://www.legendofsnowblind.com/

Teaser/Story trailer:
https://youtu.be/oxHy2Gu9eJs
Gameplay trailer
https://youtu.be/0IeP9GGrkuA

Shorts 1#:
https://youtu.be/KfmscHvEmg0
Shorts 2#:
https://youtu.be/gQvmctfXB4w
Shorts 3#:
https://youtu.be/xvsxGHjfmtE


Embark on this MYSTICAL journey in the role of FLAKE, an incredible creature.
Will you be able walk the THIN WHITE LINE BETWEEN GOOD AND EVIL?
What will you do with your chance to save the world that is hanging on a thread?

Prepare your PIPE and finest tobacco or a warm cup of TEA and get ready for long sleepless nights...
just like back in GOLDEN AGE of point and clicks with Lucas arts adventures like Monkey island, Full throttle or Indiana Jones...
only this time FROZEN COLD.
Story driven adventure, hand drawn characters, smart puzzles, and witty humor, wrapped in unique graphical style.

YEARS in the making.
Fully HAND-DRAWN and with classical FRAME-BY-FRAME animation.
More then 20 Fully VOICED characters and original SOUNDTRACK.

A game by Duje Šegvić, Ilustrator.hr
https://www.ilustrator.hr/en/ 

Music in trailer: BIG IMPACT SOUND
https://www.bigimpactsound.be/
